title: Advanced Probiotic Brewing
description:
If you are into the brewing and you have been "in" already for some time this workshop is here for you, however if you are really interested and it seems like there are some spots left well pop in too. You should already know a bit what is going on, sugars are being broken down by microbes on different compounds like lactic acid, carbon dioxide, alcohol and so on.
For more information please refer to the foodhackingbase wiki page: https://foodhackingbase.org/wiki/Advanced_brewing_36c3
